sentences.en: He got a scholarship to the Pratt Institute of Art.
sentences.cn: 他获得了普拉特艺术学院的奖学金。

sentences.en: He visited the Institute of Neurology in Havana where they both worked.
sentences.cn: 他访问了两人都曾工作过的哈瓦那的神经病学研究所.

sentences.en: I like your institute but I do not want to enrol.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢你们学院但我不想报名去你院.

sentences.en: Mr Lin is associate director of the Institute.
sentences.cn: 林先生是研究所的副所长。

sentences.en: Our institute has ordered a great many instruments from the company.
sentences.cn: 我们学院向该公司订购了不少仪器.

sentences.en: She belongs to the Chartered Institute of Management.
sentences.cn: 她属于英国特许管理协会.

sentences.en: The hottest show in town was the Monet Exhibition at the Art Institute.
sentences.cn: 全城最轰动的展览是在美术学院举办的莫奈画展。

sentences.en: The Institute of Export now fears that 100,000 jobs will go.
sentences.cn: 现在出口协会担心将失去10万个工作机会。

sentences.en: The Institute says that an unidentified virus is to blame for the syndrome.
sentences.cn: 该研究所表示,引起这种综合症的是一种尚未确认的病毒.

sentences.en: The research institute is on the track of what causes the artery damage.
sentences.cn: 研究所正在探究动脉损伤的诱因。

sentences.en: The staff members of this research institute are well - qualified and all necessary skills are represented.
sentences.cn: 这个研究所的人马相当整齐.

sentences.en: There is a middle school attached to the institute.
sentences.cn: 这个学院附设一所中学.

sentences.en: They inspected the work of the institute.
sentences.cn: 他们检查了学院的工作.

sentences.en: They institute a suit against him.
We had no choice but to institute court proceedings against the airline.
sentences.cn: 我们别无选择，只能对航空公司提起诉讼。

sentences.en: We will institute a number of measures to better safeguard the public.
sentences.cn: 我们将制定许多措施更好地保护公众。

words.tran_cn: 制度的；制度上的；学会的
制度；建立；（社会或宗教等）公共机构；习俗

phrases.tran_cn: 孔子学院（非营利性公益机构）
学院；就读学校；毕业院校
工程学院；工业学院；工科院
乔治亚理工学院（美国大学）
工业学院，技术学院；技术研究所；初级技术学院

trans.tran_en: an organization that has a particular purpose such as scientific or educational work, or the building where this organization is based
If you institute a system, rule, or course of action, you start it
to introduce or start a system, rule, legal process etc
If you institute a system, rule, or course of action, you start it
